title: Rune enthusiast - BE mission. Reward not added to balance.
body: I just completed a mission in my mission log, that would reward me with some BE, but when i clicked "ok" in the dialogue box it didnt update my balance of BE. I just wanted to ask before submitting a ticket, since i thought it might be due to the new system being implemented.

replies.body: Hey!  You'll need to head over to your hextech crafting inventory and open your capsules to get your BE.
